detailed_vulnerabilities.title: Weak Cryptographic Algorithm
detailed_vulnerabilities.description: Use of weak cryptographic algorithm MD5. Use SHA-256 or stronger.

detailed_vulnerabilities.title: Improper Authentication

detailed_vulnerabilities.title: OS Command Injection
detailed_vulnerabilities.description: Potential command injection using exec. User input should never be passed directly to system commands.

detailed_vulnerabilities.title: Insufficient Random Values
detailed_vulnerabilities.description: Use random.choice()/randint() for cryptographic operations. Use secrets module instead.

detailed_vulnerabilities.title: Unsafe Deserialization
detailed_vulnerabilities.description: Unsafe deserialization of untrusted data. Use safe alternatives like JSON.

detailed_vulnerabilities.title: OS Command Injection
detailed_vulnerabilities.description: Potential command injection using subprocess.run. User input should never be passed directly to system commands.

detailed_vulnerabilities.description: Potential path traversal vulnerability. File paths should be validated.

detailed_vulnerabilities.title: Hard-coded Password
detailed_vulnerabilities.description: Direct password comparison. Store passwords securely, never hard-code them.

detailed_vulnerabilities.title: Missing Encryption of Sensitive Data
detailed_vulnerabilities.description: Sensitive data stored without encryption. Encrypt at rest and in transit.

detailed_vulnerabilities.title: Unrestricted File Upload
